snippet: KLEINBERG--Belle, nee Koenigsberg, of San Diego died peacefully in her sleep on Sunday, May 22, 2016 at age 97. Beloved wife of the late Cantor Jacob Kleinberg. Loving and devoted mother of Ann Robin "Bobbin" and Nahman David "Nik". Cherished aunt and faithful friend to many. Her life of charitable deeds created a path for all to follow as we mourn the loss of this beautiful woman of valor. Graveside services will take place at Cedar Park Cemetery, 735 Forest Ave., Paramus, NJ on Wednesday, May 25, 2016 at 12:30pm. 1/3
